snippet: The low-budget Astros have made an investment in their future, signing second baseman Jose Altuve to a four-year contract through 2017.
lead_paragraph: The low-budget Astros have made an investment in their future, signing second baseman Jose Altuve to a four-year contract through 2017.

headline.main: Astros Give New Deal to Second Baseman Altuve
headline.print_headline: Astros Give New Deal to Altuve
